c74object.name: cicm.simpleleap
c74object.digest: A simple and light leapmotion object
c74object.description: cicm.simpleleap Reports the stabilized center position of the left and right palms in millimeters from the Leap Motion Controller origin.
c74object.discussion: cicm.simpleleap Reports the stabilized center position of the left and right palms in millimeters from the Leap Motion Controller origin.
